attributes.action: Stop charging Asthmatics for their life saving prescriptions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
5.2 Million people in the UK suffer from Asthma...thats 1 in every 5 households affected.

These people live in contant fear that thier next attack will be the one which kills them.
In 2002, 1,400 people died from asthma attacks.

The is NO cure for asthma...yet we are charged for our prescriptions when other people with long term and life threatening conditions are given free prescriptions.
We are charged for every item prescribed for asthma seperately, which at the minimum is two inhalers per prescription. Other people need much more than this just to breathe normally every day and prevent a life threatening attack.
None of us wanted to have asthma, we are stuck with it for life so why should we have to pay for treatment?

The reality of this is that there is an admission to hospital in the UK every 7.5 minutes due to asthma....
Frighteningly, this leads to 1 Death every 7 hours.
How many of these deaths could have been prevented by people being able to afford their prescriptions, and therefore managing their asthma effectively?

Please sign this petition to show you're support and to make a difference today.
Thankyou.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
